Package com.jalios.jcmsplugin.dbcomment

Class DBCommentModeratorController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jalios.jcms.BasicDataController
      • com.jalios.jcmsplugin.dbcomment.DBCommentModeratorController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.jalios.jcms.DataController, com.jalios.jcms.JcmsConstants, com.jalios.jcms.plugin.PluginComponent, com.jalios.util.JaliosConstants, java.lang.Comparable
    public class DBCommentModeratorController
extends com.jalios.jcms.BasicDataController
    This DataController checks if moderators of DBComment can change the description (comment) field when updating the data.
    Author:
    sdevaux
